overview: "Wake up, Clubber!" is a feature-length documentary about the rise of the electronic music scene in Natal in the last three years. The film is presented by Frank, dj Natalense known for coining the phrase that gives the film its name. Divided into six chapters, "Wake up, Clubber!" tells how the occupation of electronic music in public and cultural spaces of the city took place and the proportion that the movement took, becoming a project that involved a myriad of artists from different fields.
title: Wake Up, Clubber!
